title: HELP
body: At first it was a usual directX problem when i try to play league so i checked my graphics card settings to fix it and it was all up to date and perfect. So i tried a full client repair and that said an error has occurred. Then i deleted all of my stuff for league completely and redownloaded it and now i cant apply the patch 7.12 to the client because it says unspecified error occurred. I know that it is wrong with league because after the directX thing i tried csgo and it wouldnt load so i knew it was a graphics card thing but by now csgo works and not league. HELP ME... also rito this isnt good for the new players to the game who cant even play or load the game... Its almost like riot scammed me to because this happened right after i purchased the chaos set for the knew yasuo skin for $10...

replies.body:
When you fully deleted League and started to reinstall, it sounds like your pc might be blocking the installer from running properly if you're getting an unexpected error. Try going through and updating your [**permission settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) and let me know if that gets you back in.

If you're still getting that directx error, I'd also suggest checking out the [**sticky post**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/x6ylTzIT-5172017-directx-issues-with-amdradeon-graphics-cards) we have about getting that fixed up as well.
I tried it all but thank you for the directx error help. It still doesnt work after all of it so im going to send a ticket to riot games support.
